page.title: 02STREETSCAPE:A CHILD'S VIEW
page.content: In Rainham there are {Roads,Streets Closes,Walks and Avenues.}A Close is a place where there is only one way in and out and a walk is special because you can only walk in one.An avenue is special because it has trees growing along it. A lot traffic goes along Station Road but cars cannot park where there are single and double yellow lines. They can park for a little while where there are broken yellow lines. Traffic lights show you to go,or stop or get ready.The red one is for stop and the green one for go.Traffic lights are for when one car must stop and another can go. We went to have a look at the Gardens. Those in Wakeley Road had open Those in other streets had walls and hedges and gates.
